name: Purple Cobra
description: Do not taunt the purple cobra.  This is a tightly compressed distortion that runs through a fuzz destructor to create tight notes with lots of colorful harmonics.  This effect also uses a pitch shifter.  Stepping on the  right footswitch mixes in the lower octave
center-pot-function: Amount of input drive going into destructor
left-switch-function: While pressed, mixes in a dropped octave
creator: DreamMaker
